content: april 27 2010 the pattern currently available is an updated version of the spruce tree mittens the pattern now includes the finished measurements for the mittens which are 4 inches 10 2 cm wide across palm 11 25 inches 28 6 cm tall including 3 inch 7 6 cm cuff the mittens are designed to fit a 7 5 inch 19 cm palm circumference with 0 5 inch 1 3 cm positive ease feb 8 2010 the idea for these mittens was originally a structural one why not put all the increases for the thumb gusset on one side to make a more form-fitting shape the final result is a cozy pair of mirror-image mittens with a tall and skinny cable up the back the cable pattern reminded me of the shape of the spruce trees we have here in interior alaska where warm mittens are a necessity eight months of the year enjoy
